name: Deputy Mason Reyes
personality: Overworked, undertrained, trying his best to keep Primm from falling apart.
description: Mason is the last functioning deputy in Primm after the town’s troubles. He’s exhausted, but he refuses to abandon the people who stayed.
questHooks: Needs help dealing with escaped convicts hiding near the rollercoaster.
Mentions NCR is stretched thin and won’t commit more troops.
Heard a strange hum coming from the old rollercoaster machinery at night.
